subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Quentin Richardson scored 34 points and grabbed 12 rebounds and Wilson Chandler, David Lee and Nate Robinson all topped 20 points to lead the Knicks to victory on Saturday.
snippet: Quentin Richardson scored 34 points and grabbed 12 rebounds and Wilson Chandler, David Lee and Nate Robinson all topped 20 points to lead the Knicks to victory on Saturday.
